name: limbus-ci
description: A simple CI solution for testing extremely portable applications.

scripts.build: rm bin/limbus-ci ; mkdir -p generated && echo \#\!/usr/bin/env node > generated/header && cat generated/header limbus-ci.js > bin/limbus-ci && chmod +x bin/limbus-ci
